tagline: Where the bits left over from Twitter and Tumblr go
body:
# Huh?

Well, I'm trying to understand Github Pages. So far, I've got the repo created with the right name, and I've chosen Automatic Pages in the admin, and I'm editing this, in what I think is the `README.md` file. I'll pick a theme and then press on and see what I get.

I don't know if `README.md` is the main page, or if it is only when using auto generated pages, or only if there's no `index` file.

I will also have to figure out how I add pages. Do I have to do that in a working copy, or can I also do that though the website?

Content later.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Ryan's Bits
